headline: How major US stock indexes fared Tuesday, 7/29/2025
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 204 points, and the Nasdaq composite sliced 0.4% off its own record. SoFi Technologies rallied, but Merck and UPS fell following a jumbled set of profit reports. Treasury yields sank in the bond market as the Federal Reserve began a two-day meeting on interest rates.

headline: Why Merck (MRK) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of global pharmaceutical company Merck (NYSE:MRK) fell 3.2% in the afternoon session after the company reported second-quarter financial results that missed revenue expectations and revealed a new multi-year cost-cutting initiative. The pharmaceutical giant posted total sales of $15.8 billion, representing a 2% decrease from the same period last year. headline: Royal Caribbean, Merck, FuboTV: Trending Tickers
summary: Royal Caribbean (RCL) stock falls despite the company lifting its full-year outlook. FuboTV (FUBO) released its preliminary second quarter results, which were better than previous expectations. FuboTV stock is trading higher in Tuesday's session on the news, and the company's full report will be released on Tuesday, Aug. 8. headline: Merck’s (NYSE:MRK) Q2 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations
summary: Global pharmaceutical company Merck (NYSE:MRK) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q2 CY2025, but sales fell by 1.9% year on year to $15.81 billion. The company’s outlook for the full year was close to analysts’ estimates with revenue guided to $64.8 billion at the midpoint. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.13 per share was 5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Merck’s (NYSE:MRK) Q2 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations

The company’s outlook for the full year was close to analysts’ estimates with revenue guided to $64.8 billion at the midpoint. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.13 per share was 5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Merck: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: RAHWAY, N.J. (AP) — Merck & Co. (MRK) on Tuesday reported second-quarter profit of $4.43 billion. On a per-share basis, the Rahway, New Jersey-based company said it had profit of $1.76. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $2.13 per share.

raw.headline: Merck: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: RAHWAY, N.J. (AP) — Merck & Co. (MRK) on Tuesday reported second-quarter profit of $4.43 billion. On a per-share basis, the Rahway, New Jersey-based company said it had profit of $1.76. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $2.13 per share.

headline: Merck to cut jobs and costs as demand for Gardasil in China remains weak
summary: (Reuters) -Merck & Co on Tuesday announced job and cost cuts it said will save $3 billion a year as it posted lower second-quarter results due to continuing weak demand for its Gardasil vaccine in China.  The company said the cost cuts include $1.7 billion in annual savings from the elimination of certain administrative, sales and R&D positions.  Chief Executive Rob Davis said in a press release that the moves "will redirect investment and resources from more mature areas of our business to our burgeoning array of new growth drivers."

raw.headline: Merck to cut jobs and costs as demand for Gardasil in China remains weak
raw.summary: (Reuters) -Merck & Co on Tuesday announced job and cost cuts it said will save $3 billion a year as it posted lower second-quarter results due to continuing weak demand for its Gardasil vaccine in China.  The company said the cost cuts include $1.7 billion in annual savings from the elimination of certain administrative, sales and R&D positions.  Chief Executive Rob Davis said in a press release that the moves "will redirect investment and resources from more mature areas of our business to our burgeoning array of new growth drivers."
